title: Portfolio site v2 launch
body: Redesigned the portfolio with an orange cat theme, added all projects with generated screenshots, and integrated admin status editing.

title: Trackademic pushed to GitHub
body: Finished the full-stack student deadline tracker with React, Express, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, and Prisma. Pushed the complete codebase.

title: Video Renting Software uploaded
body: Published the video rental management system project to GitHub.
